openGraph.title: GoDaddy Helps Small Businesses Get Noticed Online
openGraph.description: GoDaddy has everything you need to create, manage and promote your business in your neighborhood or around the world. When you're ready to get online, we're ready to help. Click here to get started.

meta.description: GoDaddy makes registering Domain Names fast, simple, and affordable. Find out why so many business owners chose GoDaddy to be their Domain Name Registrar.

keyBenefitsPro.title: WordPress Hosting for pros - like you.

keyBenefits.title: More features so you can flex your skills.
keyBenefits.text: Want one-click staging? How about sFTP/SSH with wp-cli and git? We got plenty where that came from.

keyBenefits.title: Security that's ready for (almost) anythhing.
keyBenefits.text: Intrusion detection. Brute force login protection. DDOS intigration. We've got the place surrounded.

keyBenefits.title: Big love for WordPress.
keyBenefits.text: We're proud to support such an engaged, passionate community through WordCamp.

featuresListPro.title: Dig into the details
featuresListPro.subTitle: We have everything you and your clients need.

options.title: Free Domain & Temp Domain
options.content:
What does Unlimited mean?

We don't provide hard limits on bandwidth and storage (Deluxe and Ultimate Plans), but we do ask that your site conforms to our terms of service. Most personal and small business websites will never have an issue; those that do are usually outside of the terms and conditions (file sharing, suing their hosting account as backup and storage, etc.)

If you're really exceeding your bandwidth or storage - to the point that it's a risk to our servers stability, performance, uptime, etc. - we may limit your usage or require you to move to a VPS or Dedicated Server.

Whic resources are limited?

CPU, RAM, Entry Processes, I/O, Inodes

What if I exceed my resources?

Your site will slow down, and in cases with very high traffic, it won't load at all. You can add more resources on-demand within your shared hosting account, but if you're still pushing the limits, you may want to look into a VPS or Dedicated Server.

panels.subtitle: Bye-bye, busy work.
panels.text: You know all those tasks that eat away at your design time? Setting up your server. Daily site backups. WordPress core updates. We handle them all, so you can focus on developing kick-ass sites.

panels.subtitle: Packed with pro features.
panels.text: We built Managed WordPress for designers and developers who need real tools, not hand-holding. One-click staging and restore. SSH with wp-cli and git. We’ve got it all – so you can work smart, blow your client’s expectations out of the water and move on to the next job.

panels.subtitle: Migrate your WordPress with just a click
panels.text: You love WordPress. So do we. That's why we offer one-click WordPress migration. Click. Transfer. Get back to work. Of course, we’re not magicians. There are a couple situations where you’d need to manually migrate your site.

panels.subtitle: It doesn't just run WordPress.  It was built for it.
panels.text: Our secret recipe? Load-balanced servers dedicated to hosting WordPress. Super-efficient caching. Redundant SSD-backed file and database servers. And custom tweaks you won't find anywhere else, developed by our in-house WordPress gurus.

panels.title: Everybody says they're fast...
panels.text: You don't have to guess which WordPress host has the goods and which ones are blowing smoke. Cloud Spectator, an independent 3rd party, ran the top hosts through their paces and we're pretty pleased with the results.

testimonials.quote: The web hosting product has far exceeded my expectations. I should have switched to hosting with GoDaddy years ago!
testimonials.name: Joe Somebody

testimonials.quote: 2The web hosting product has far exceeded my expectations. I should have switched to hosting with GoDaddy years ago!

disclaimersModalText.text: * Plus ICANN fee of $0.18 per domain name registration year.
** Domains with bulk pricing do not qualify for additional promotional discounts.
Products will automatically renew until canceled. You may turn off the auto-renewal feature by visiting your GoDaddy account.
